---@class btConfigMap
local btConfigMap = {}

 btConfigMap.classPath = {
    ["bt_con_battle_process"] = "battle/behaviourConfig/battle_frame/bt_con_battle_process"
}


function btConfigMap:getClass(className)
    if self.classPath and self.classPath[className] then
        return require_path(className, self.classPath[className])
    else
        Logger.Error("btConfigMap 文件 没有配置  ",className ," 数据 ")
    end
end

return btConfigMap
